Traits.Name: Ominous Presence
Traits.Content: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the Goatman must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of their next turn.

Traits.Name: Stalker of the Shadows
Traits.Content: The Goatman has advantage on Stealth checks made in wooded or dark areas, allowing it to blend in with the environment.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Goatman makes three melee attacks (either Primary Melee or Secondary) or two Primary Ranged attacks.

Actions.Name: Primary Melee Attack
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage as it lunges forward with its sharp horns.

Actions.Name: Secondary Melee Attack
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, they must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of their next turn as the Goatman glares menacingly.

Actions.Name: Primary Ranged Attack
Actions.Content: Ranged Attack: +7 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage as the Goatman hurls a jagged rock with uncanny accuracy.

Actions.Name: Reaction
Actions.Content: The Goatman uses a Reaction to add 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the creature must see the attacker, moving quickly to avoid the strike.
